bio: Multifunctional Omnichain Solution, specialized in LayerZero-centered tools
impactDescription:
Making it easy to connect to almost any chain benefits not only end-users, but also native dApps and the network itself.

For end-users:
Onboarding them seamlessly to Optimism and other chains, allowing them to try out any dApp residing on the network. Our 'Checker' introduces them to a comprehensive list of apps to discover.

For Optimism:
This ultimately promotes network activity and traffic on the native chain, proven by our impact metrics.

Merkly has:
• 2620 daily active users transacting on Optimism 
• Over 6000 daily transactions on Optimism
• Over 139K unique addresses transacting on Optimism in the last 90 days

While also being the #9 most used dApp on Optimism.

Cohesive breakdown of metrics: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sadllTl9EY4Llb-4tuyKFkV5f2pwxy4Es66oCiUZ4VU/edit
contributionDescription:
Merkly is a multifunctional Omnichain solution, designed to simplify DeFi for individuals of all knowledge levels. 

We aim to familiarize even non-crypto natives with LayerZero, Layer 1 and Layer 2 chains via various tools —  all unified into one Super-App. 

Our tools allow users to effortlessly connect and onboard to over 30 different chains (including Optimism), which promotes network growth.

Our current product suite:
• Gas Refuel: Get native gas tokens on Optimism and +30 chains
• Bridging of ONFTs/Tokens: Bridge NFTs to Optimism and +30 chains
• Activity Checker: Discover over 20 Omnichain dApps to interact with

All our features are harnessing LayerZero's technology to ensure robustness, safety and high performance.

impactMetrics.description: Optimism Transactions per day on Merkly
#9 most used dApp on Optimism (90 Days)

fundingSources.description: Merkly hasn't received any OP yet – this is our first application.
